header.#text:
Additional
			 funding for the Pregnancy Assistance Fund

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
		  to authorize additional funding for the pregnancy assistance
		  fund.
